mapper.select: SELECT menu_srl AS menuSrl ,menu_srl AS menuSrl1 ,"" AS menuSrl2 ,parent_srl ,menu_nm ,menu_url ,use_yn ,menu_stp FROM auth_menu WHERE parent_srl = 0 ORDER BY menu_stp

SELECT t2.menu_srl AS menuSrl ,t1.menu_srl AS menuSrl1 ,t2.menu_srl AS menuSrl2 ,t2.menu_nm ,t2.menu_url ,t2.use_yn ,t2.menu_stp FROM auth_menu AS t1 LEFT JOIN auth_menu AS t2 ON t2.parent_srl = t1.menu_srl WHERE t1.menu_srl = #{menuSrl1} AND t2.menu_srl is not null ORDER BY t2.menu_stp

SELECT t3.menu_srl AS menuSrl ,t3.menu_nm ,t3.menu_url ,t3.use_yn ,t3.menu_stp FROM auth_menu AS t1 LEFT JOIN auth_menu AS t2 ON t2.parent_srl = t1.menu_srl LEFT JOIN auth_menu AS t3 ON t3.parent_srl = t2.menu_srl WHERE t1.menu_srl = #{menuSrl1} AND t2.menu_srl = #{menuSrl2} AND t3.menu_srl is not null ORDER BY t3.menu_stp

SELECT A.menuSrl, A.menuSrl1, A.menuSrl2, A.menuSrl2, A.menuNm, A.menuLev ,CASE WHEN B.menu_srl is not null THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS useYn FROM( SELECT menu_srl AS menuSrl ,menu_srl AS menuSrl1 ,'' AS menuSrl2 ,'' AS menuSrl3 ,menu_nm AS menuNm ,menu_stp AS stp1 ,0 AS stp2 ,0 AS stp3 ,'1' AS menuLev FROM auth_menu WHERE parent_srl = 0 AND use_yn = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT t2.menu_srl AS menuSrl ,t1.menu_srl AS menuSrl1 ,t2.menu_srl AS menuSrl2 ,'' AS menuSrl3 ,t2.menu_nm AS menuNm ,t1.menu_stp AS stp1 ,t2.menu_stp AS stp2 ,0 AS stp3 ,'2' AS menuLev FROM auth_menu t1, auth_menu t2 WHERE t2.parent_srl = t1.menu_srl AND t1.parent_srl = 0 AND t2.use_yn = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT t3.menu_srl AS menuSrl ,t1.menu_srl AS menuSrl1 ,t2.menu_srl AS menuSrl2 ,t3.menu_srl AS menuSrl3 ,t3.menu_nm AS menuNm ,t1.menu_stp AS stp1 ,t2.menu_stp AS stp2 ,t3.menu_stp AS stp3 ,'3' AS menuLev FROM auth_menu t1, auth_menu t2 , auth_menu t3 WHERE t2.parent_srl = t1.menu_srl AND t3.parent_srl = t2.menu_srl AND t1.parent_srl = 0 AND t3.use_yn = 'Y' ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT menu_srl FROM auth_menu_role WHERE role_cd = #{roleCd}) B ON A.menuSrl = B.menu_srl ORDER BY stp1, stp2, stp3

SELECT menuSrl, menuSrl1, menuSrl2, menuSrl2, menuNm, menuUrl, menuLev FROM( SELECT menu_srl AS menuSrl ,menu_srl AS menuSrl1 ,'' AS menuSrl2 ,'' AS menuSrl3 ,menu_nm AS menuNm ,menu_url AS menuUrl ,menu_stp AS stp1 ,0 AS stp2 ,0 AS stp3 ,'1' AS menuLev FROM auth_menu WHERE parent_srl = 0 UNION ALL SELECT t2.menu_srl AS menuSrl ,t1.menu_srl AS menuSrl1 ,t2.menu_srl AS menuSrl2 ,'' AS menuSrl3 ,t2.menu_nm AS menuNm ,t2.menu_url AS menuUrl ,t1.menu_stp AS stp1 ,t2.menu_stp AS stp2 ,0 AS stp3 ,'2' AS menuLev FROM auth_menu t1, auth_menu t2 WHERE t2.parent_srl = t1.menu_srl AND t1.parent_srl = 0 UNION ALL SELECT t3.menu_srl AS menuSrl ,t1.menu_srl AS menuSrl1 ,t2.menu_srl AS menuSrl2 ,t3.menu_srl AS menuSrl3 ,t3.menu_nm AS menuNm ,t3.menu_url AS menuUrl ,t1.menu_stp AS stp1 ,t2.menu_stp AS stp2 ,t3.menu_stp AS stp3 ,'3' AS menuLev FROM auth_menu t1, auth_menu t2 , auth_menu t3 WHERE t2.parent_srl = t1.menu_srl AND t3.parent_srl = t2.menu_srl AND t1.parent_srl = 0
) A , (SELECT menu_srl FROM auth_menu_role WHERE role_cd = #{roleCd}) B WHERE A.menuSrl = B.menu_srl ORDER BY stp1, stp2, stp3
SELECT menu_srl ,parent_srl ,menu_nm ,menu_url ,use_yn ,menu_stp FROM auth_menu WHERE menu_srl = #{menuSrl}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM auth_menu WHERE menu_srl IN ( SELECT t2.menu_srl FROM auth_menu AS t1, auth_menu AS t2 WHERE t2.parent_srl = t1.menu_srl AND t1.menu_srl = #{menuSrl} )
